# The words after "#" are comments. No need to remove them.
luminosity = 2153.74   # in pb-1 (FIXED)
channels = 45          # total number of channels -> following our search bin definition (FIXED)
sample = lostle        # name of the background: hadtau, lostle, zinv, qcd, ttz

# Average weight for lost lepton, Zinv and ttZ: avg_weight x cs_event = rate.

# All the uncertainties in absolute numbers for both stat and syst uncertainties.

# For symmetric uncertainties, put the up and dn to be the same.
